name: py-jupyter-server
description:
The Jupyter Server provides the backend (i.e. the core services, APIs,
and REST endpoints) for Jupyter web applications like Jupyter notebook,
JupyterLab, and Voila.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-jupyter-packaging11
dependencies.description: Jupyter Packaging Utilities, version 11.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-tornado
dependencies.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependencies.name: py-pyzmq
dependencies.description: PyZMQ: Python bindings for zeromq.

dependencies.name: py-argon2-cffi
dependencies.description: The secure Argon2 password hashing algorithm..

dependencies.name: py-ipython-genutils
dependencies.description: Vestigial utilities from IPython

dependencies.name: py-traitlets
dependencies.description: Traitlets Python config system

dependencies.name: py-jupyter-core
dependencies.description: Core Jupyter functionality

dependencies.name: py-jupyter-client
dependencies.description: Jupyter protocol client APIs

dependencies.name: py-nbformat
dependencies.description: The Jupyter Notebook format

dependencies.name: py-nbconvert
dependencies.description: Jupyter Notebook Conversion

dependencies.name: py-send2trash
dependencies.description: Python library to send files to Trash/Recycle on all platforms.

dependencies.name: py-terminado
dependencies.description: Terminals served to term.js using Tornado websockets

dependencies.name: py-prometheus-client
dependencies.description: Prometheus instrumentation library for Python applications.

dependencies.name: py-anyio
dependencies.description:
High level compatibility layer for multiple asynchronous event loop
implementations.

dependencies.name: py-websocket-client
dependencies.description: WebSocket client for Python. hybi13 is supported.

dependencies.name: py-packaging
dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-requests-unixsocket
dependencies.description: Use requests to talk HTTP via a UNIX domain socket.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab
dependent_to.description:
JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project
Jupyter.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab-server
dependent_to.description:
A set of server components for JupyterLab and JupyterLab like
applications

dependent_to.name: py-nbdime
dependent_to.description: Diff and merge of Jupyter Notebooks

dependent_to.name: py-nbclassic
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebook as a Jupyter Server Extension.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-server-mathjax
dependent_to.description: MathJax resources as a Jupyter Server Extension.
